箱中气候.encontent: Ahh, photosynthesis feels good as always.
箱中气候.content: 呼～光合作用的感觉还是那么好。

致未来.encontent:
We have our backs to the "past," our feet in the "present,"
 and lead people to the "future." What a wonderful
 story.
致未来.content:
我们背靠着“过去”，驻足于“现在”，引领众人奔赴“未
来”。真是一个精彩的故事。

孑立.encontent: FM, FM, the latest news for you next ...
孑立.content: 调频，调频，接下来为您播报最新的快讯……

问候.content: 欢迎你的到来。我的好朋友。

朝晨.encontent:
I've selected some morning news from 249 regions ...
 Would you like to know which region consumes the most
 meat every morning?
朝晨.content:
我筛选了249个地区的晨间新闻内容……您想知道每天
早晨摄入肉食最多的地区是哪儿吗？

信任-朝晨.encontent:
Now, I am going to clean the dust under the battery
 cover. Please guard the door for me and don't let
 anyone get close.
信任-朝晨.content:
现在，我要清理电池盖后的灰尘了，请您帮我守住这扇门
，不要让任何人靠近。

夜暮.encontent:
Somewhere on Earth, there are always people working
 ... .That's why the world is forever awake.
夜暮.content: 在地球的某一端，总有人在工作……所以世界永远清醒。

信任-夜暮.encontent:
No matter how the world has changed, it looks up to
 one abiding moon ...  Please rest at ease.
信任-夜暮.content: 不管世界如何变化，月亮都是一样的……请安心休息。

帽檐与发鬓.encontent:
This will cause me to malfunction, please don't ... News from
 yesterday: the latest economic focus meeting has been held on
 Grazing Hilltop. Cows attending the meeting believed donut holes
 and poor pessimists to be the causation of the recent cold wave.
 Gold-raising and lava-raising are therefore urgently required
 ...
帽檐与发鬓.content:
这样会令我混乱的，请不要……昨日快讯，放牧山顶召开
最新经济焦点会议，牛儿们认为甜甜圈之洞与可怜的悲观
者是近日寒流的根源所在，我们应当尽快筹集黄金与岩浆
……

衣着与身形.encontent:
Thanks to your careful maintenance, my color stays
 beautiful and fresh.
衣着与身形.content: 多亏了您的悉心保养，令我保持这样漂亮的颜色。

嗜好.encontent:
Those fluffy quadrupeds have a long history of such
 behavior, using fraudulent appearances to commit some
 dangerous acts ... They are not here, right?
嗜好.content:
那些毛绒绒的四足兽历来如此，用富于欺诈性的外表做出
一些危险行为……这儿应该没有吧？

赞赏.encontent:
It's amazing, please allow me to play a song to praise
 you.
赞赏.content: 真了不起，请让我为您播放一首赞美的乐曲。

亲昵.encontent:
Could you put me into the water? Could you leave me near the
 fireplace? I have no eyesight, which makes me on tenterhooks.
 Please look after me, guide me to feel them, and take me away
 when necessary.
亲昵.content:
能将我放进水中吗？能将我靠近火炉吗？我没有视觉，又
担心危险，请您看护着我，让我感受它们，在必要时将我
拿开。

闲谈Ⅰ.encontent:
Someone once tried to steal me, and stuffed his own
 ears with earplugs ... until he later understood that
 some "voices" cannot be blocked.
闲谈Ⅰ.content:
曾经有人想要偷走我，他用耳塞堵住了自己的耳朵……后
来，他大概明白了有些声音是阻挡不了的。

闲谈Ⅱ.encontent:
Please promise me NOT to open my battery cover, and honor your
 own word. I hope you will not be another Psyche, and I won't
 be the crane flying over the mountains.
闲谈Ⅱ.content:
请绝不要打开我的电池盖，这许诺重如千金。希望您不会
是普绪克，我也不至成为飞越群山的仙鹤。

独白.encontent:
... Every question has an answer, but not every question
 needs an answer. Flowers in the garden know nothing,
 but they still keep blooming.
独白.content:
……每个问题都有答案，但不是每个问题都需要答案。园
中的鲜花一无所知，但它们仍旧盛开。

战前.encontent: Maybe I should switch to a more exciting channel.
战前.content: 或许我应该切换到更激昂的广播频道。

召唤至终的仪式.encontent: Knowing nothing is also a blessing.

战斗胜利.encontent: Joy of victory is also new knowledge.
战斗胜利.content: 胜利的喜悦也是一种新的知识。

洞悉.encontent:
The moment when dirt bids farewell to the machine is
 worth remembering forever.
洞悉.content: 脏东西告别机体的时刻值得永远铭记。
